item.description:
Hello All,

I hope all those who attended the May fiesta had a great time.
Congrats again to our winners of the Most Fabulous PUP contest! (AMY/CUCCUY and DANAE/GOOBER DEAN as well all members who participated!)


Please note to anyone who may have planned to attend the May 13th Meetup at Paws for a Cause
has been canceled. No further Meetups will be held at this location ONLY until further notice.

All future Meetups (June and onward) will be held in two locations for the summer season.
TIME:...1:00PM

1. Boston Common (near the Boylston T stop/Lowes theater side)

2. DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER (Tremont Street, South end, Boston ...our usual location )


Since we will be expecting warmer weather you can choose to go either indoors or outdoors.
and as a special added treat....as always all merchandise at Doggie Day/S'poochies is 20% off on the day of our Meetups.
Please remember to make note as to which location you willbe attending.


Stay well, see you all in June!
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua June Meetup
